title: Vending machines : sales volume of vended products 2010
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars). In total the number of data points it has is 12.
Overall Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars) has increased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars), about 47.5 was reported at Year 2007
Minimum Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars) about 36.6 was reached at Year 1999
